title: Health Ranger Report with Mike Adams: Thomas Renz preparing to expose Fauci for CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY
cleaned_text:
Health Ranger Report with Mike Adams: Thomas Renz preparing to expose Fauci for CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY

Attorney Thomas Renz is preparing to file a lawsuit against White House Chief Medical Advisor Dr. Anthony Fauci.

In an interview with Mike Adams, the Health Ranger, Renz pointed out that he is finalizing the details of his lawsuit, which will definitively prove Fauci’s role in helping create the Wuhan coronavirus (COVID-19).

According to Renz, he has strong evidence proving that Fauci worked with the Chinese Communist Party and the Wuhan Institute of Virology to fund the creation of the coronavirus in their labs. (Related: Thomas Renz is suing the globalists who perpetrated the COVID-19 pandemic by using their own words against them.)

“We’re going to go through all the details, we’re going to answer the questions about gain-of-function [research], and we’re going to shed the light of truth on some very dark places in the government,” he said.

“We’ve got the evidence, we’ve got witnesses, we’ve been building this [case] all summer long,” said Renz. “I think it’s going to be pretty monumental, and I think that people are going to have to ask themselves, ‘If they’ve lied about this, what else have they lied about?’ And the answer is everything, of course.”

Both Renz and Adams agree that it isn’t just Fauci who needs to be taken to court. They both believe that all of the perpetrators of the COVID-19 pandemic, and everyone else who has violated the Nuremberg Code – a set of ethical principles for conducting human experimentation – should be prosecuted for crimes against humanity. (Related: Thomas Renz: People behind COVID vaccines belong in jail.)

Fauci is resigning – but Renz will still go after him

Fauci recently announced that he will be leaving the federal government in December after working in public health for more than five decades. He will be resigning from his post as chief medical advisor to the White House and as director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), the latter being a position he has held since 1984.

He called leading the NIAID the “honor of a lifetime,” and that he is “very proud” of his and his agency’s many so-called accomplishments. Fauci added that while he is resigning from government work, he does not plan to retire.

“I plan to pursue the next phase of my career while I still have so much energy and passion for my field,” he said. “I want to use what I have learned as NIAID director to continue to advance science and public health and to inspire and mentor the next generation of scientific leaders as they help prepare the world to face future infectious diseases.”

Adams and Renz will certainly not miss Fauci.

“He’s trying to scoot out of town before he can be investigated,” noted Adams. “You have now members of Congress and senators even calling for investigations into Fauci.”

“He’s going away,” said Renz. “[But] I’m still going to be fighting and all these guys are gonna go away.”

Learn more about Fauci at FauciTruth.com.

Watch attorney Thomas Renz’s full interview with Mike Adams, the Health Ranger, on this episode of the “Health Ranger Report.”

This video is from the Health Ranger Report channel on Brighteon.com.

Fauci to resign from government after more than five decades of murdering people in the name of “science.”

Old video resurfaces of Fauci admitting that the best “vaccine” is to simply get infected and develop natural immunity.
